dab.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a small amount of something that you put onto a surface
dab.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a light touch with your hand, a cloth etc
dab.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: She wiped her tears away with a dab of her handkerchief.
dab.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to touch something lightly several times, usually with something such as a cloth
dab.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: She dabbed her eyes with a handkerchief.
He dabbed at his bleeding lip.
dab.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to put a substance onto something with quick light movements of your hand
dab.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: She dabbed some cream on her face.
dab.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: a system of broadcasting radio programmes using digital technology
